title: Can I still play with Riot for my 1000 wins?
body:
I reached 1K wins a couple of weeks ago and wanted to know if I could still play with Riot
My IGN on league (OCE) is MrKillerKow 
Hope this is still possible

replies.body:
Hi!

Sorry I missed this. Let me know when you can play!
I'm sure one of them would be up for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BzhElNEd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-11T23:11:26.403+0000)
>
> I'm sure one of them would be up for it.

I hope :D

> [{quoted}](name=MrKillerKow,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BzhElNEd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T07:22:09.881+0000)
>
> I hope :D

I will bump this up for ya. GL :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BzhElNEd,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T20:59:01.515+0000)
>
> I will bump this up for ya. GL :^)

Thanks :D
